post.body: hah! I have to say the Z looking one cuz it never fits anywhere!
hah, my mom and I won't let him drive in the middle of nowhere. He'd rack up way too many speeding tickets, lol
Hopefully it'll make it to IAD http://twitpic.com/10588
Hanging out at CLT
Stuck in Charlotte :(
Sitting on the tarmac at LAS... spending the night at CLT, anything good in town?
This flight to Charlotte may leave afterall...
Let the delays begin... sitting at LAS
Headed back to the hotel... Bye Bye Las Vegas :)
Vegas wouldn't be complete without seeing the Chippendales and their girls in the Show in thd Sky at Rio... with the parents, LOL
Amazing ride!!! Out on Fremont St now... the origins of Vegas!
Headed out for a helicopter tour of the Vegas strip!
at Le Cafe in Paris :P
Off to the last day on the strip!
Bye bye Grand Canyon!
http://twitpic.com/ze4r
At the grand canyon!!! Along with a foot of snow :P
About an hour from the southern rim of the grand canyon! http://tinyurl.com/99x8ac
Driving down route 66 :)
I love when the tour bus gets pulled over by Arizona state police :P
